nodes.name: Init
Set channel parameters
calculate virtual values
Set sensor value on bridge
set error
Set log file name
nodes.func:
msg.logfile = "bridge-" + env.get("NR_FLOW_NAME") + ".log"

return msg;

nodes.name: send virtual data
Set init image
Subscribe to commands for this bridge
Error
nodes.func:
node.warn("The bridge configuration is wrong!")
node.done()

nodes.name: prepare write data
Write data
Update image
Update Metric
Styles
nodes.format:
<script id="logo-script" type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        const logoId = 'logo-div';
        var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
        if(!toolbar.length) return;
        if($("#" + logoId).length > 0) return;

        var div = $('<div/>');
        div[0].style.margin = '10px 10px 10px auto';
        div.attr('id', logoId);

        var logo = new Image();
        logo.src = 'https://triopan.ch/images/logo.png'
        logo.height = 32;
        
        div.append(logo);
        toolbar.append(div);
    });
    $('link[rel="shortcut icon"]').attr('href', 'https://triopan.ch/images/logo.png');
    $('link[rel="icon"]').attr('href', 'https://triopan.ch/images/logo.png');
</script>
<style>
    md-list-item .md-avatar {
        border-radius: 0% !important;
    }
<\style>
